NewsArticle.Title: Valentine's Event & the Oren Fair
NewsArticle.Content: - The Valentine's Event will begin on Tuesday, Feb. 14th and will last one week. Any registered character will be able to participate in the quest to get the Heart Puppet. The Divine Love Ring will also be available during this time. -The Oren Fair will begin on Wednesday, Feb. 15th and will also last one week. New formal clothing will be available through Ertha. -During the fair, registered Aislings will have a random chance to win a pet Rock Cobbler from Areini, owner of the pet store.
